about.name: Oleksandr Oliinychenko
description: Mathematician by education. Until 2003, worked at the Institute of Mathematics of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine. Over the next 10 years, went from a sales manager to a distribution company manager (FMCG).
In 2013, moved to internet marketing. Participated in the promotion of several educational projects. Since 2016, I've been doing what I really love - web development and UX design.
Development of a banking application for internal operations.
SCSS/Pug templates + Angular 8 + PrimeNG components.
Creation of custom UI elements and support of extensible architecture.
Close collaboration with QA and backend teams to ensure smooth integration.
Application architecture and front-end logic for PWA.
Layout + Angular + Node.js + MongoDB stack.
Used Material Design framework for UI.
Integrated share features via Facebook, VK, and Twitter APIs.
Taxi booking platform development for operators and customers.
Angular for admin dashboard.
Express.js + Sequelize + Postgres for backend.
Material Design and MUI frameworks for UI.
Used React in an app for placing customer orders.
React-based admin dashboard for event creation and management with MUI framework.
Developed internal admin panel for customer support tasks.
Mobile application development using React Native + deployment to stores.
Maintained and optimized PostgreSQL database structure.
Set up different marketing campaigns and integrated analytics tools.

details.copywriting: Took many copywriting courses. Able to clearly and concisely convey the essence in texts. Regularly applies this skill in UI creation.
details.psychology: Interested in how people make decisions and how desires work. Applies knowledge in practice, e.g., when creating landing pages.
details.gtmGa: Worked with these tools on several projects. Able to set up integrations and link them, e.g., with Google Ads.
details.webdesign: Completed quality web design courses and keeps up with current trends through resources like Awwwards and CSS Design Awards. Knows how to create modern, visually strong, and user-friendly interfaces.
details.materialDesign: Well-versed in Material Design principles and applies them in interface development. Regularly works with Material Design from Angular and MUI.
details.wordpress: Created many websites on WordPress. Knows the basics of PHP, enabling effective code fixing and optimization when needed.
details.videoEditing: Can write scripts and create videos using modern video editing tools. Can provide work samples if needed.
details.googleAds: Completed professional certification in 2016. Set up and optimized many ad campaigns. Can significantly improve the conversion rate of existing campaigns.
details.ai: Uses AI tools in development and keeps up with the latest innovations. Works with CURSOR AI.

firstProjects.title: First Projects
firstProjects.text: The projects presented here were created between 2016 and 2017, at the very beginning of my professional journey as a developer. Even then, I focused on creating a clean, detailed, and thoughtful user experience and tried to fallow best development practices.

currentWork.title: How I Work Now
currentWork.text1: Since my first projects, my skills have grown significantly. You can evaluate the quality of my current work by reviewing the <0>source code</0> of this website.
currentWork.text2: It's built on React and the MUI component library, uses React Router for navigation, and supports three languages through localization. Animations are handled by Motion, and code quality is maintained with Prettier and ESLint. The app is automatically deployed to GitHub Pages.
currentWork.text3: Additionally, I actively incorporate AI tools into my development workflow, which significantly increases productivity and speeds up both coding and problem-solving.
